acrossWords.definition: A fruit that is typically red, green, or yellow.
A long curved fruit that grows in clusters and has soft pulpy flesh and yellow skin when ripe.
A small, round stone fruit that is typically bright or dark red.

downWords.definition: A large round juicy citrus fruit with a tough bright reddish-yellow rind.
A fleshy yellowish-red tropical fruit that is eaten ripe or used green for pickles or chutneys.
A sweet yellowish- or brownish-green edible fruit that is typically narrow at the stalk and wider towards the base.
